GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14.212 to before v4.14.233
GSD.description:
spi: Fix use-after-free with devm_spi_alloc_*

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.233 by commit 8e029707f50a82c53172359c686b2536ab54e58c, it was introduced in version v4.14.212 by commit 8c45a1c6c951bbe7f95db78fcab46f7337364468. For more details please see the references link.
